Egyptian Goddess Value Pack
kDesc
Includes Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Ma'at, Nephthys and Sekhmet Heads plus Goddess Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
Ce pack "Déesses égyptiennes" de 8 accessoires contient les têtes de Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Maât, Nephthys et Sekhmet ainsi qu'un haut et un bas divins. [#Legal]
Enthält: Köpfe von Bastet, Hathor, Maat, Nephthys und Sekhmet sowie Göttinnen-Ober- und -Unterteil. Ein achtteiliges Set also! [#Legal]
Include le teste di Bastet, Hathor, Iside, Ma'at, Nefti e Sekhmet, più top e gambe da dea, per un totale di 8 pezzi! [#Legal]
Incluye cabezas de Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Maat, Neftis y Sekhmet, además de ropa de arriba y abajo, ¡un total de 8 piezas! [#Legal]
Includes Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Ma'at, Nephthys and Sekhmet Heads plus Goddess Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
바스텟, 하토르, 이시스, 마앗, 네프티스, 그리고 세크메트의 머리와 여신의 상의, 하의를 포함합니다.[#Legal]
Includes Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Ma'at, Nephthys and Sekhmet Heads plus Goddess Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
包括八件女神的上衣和下身服裝：貓女神貝絲蒂、愛神哈索爾、農業女神伊西斯、正義女神馬特、死亡女神奈芙提斯和女戰神賽克麥特。[#Legal]
包括八件女神的上衣和下半身服裝：貓女神貝絲蒂、愛神哈索爾、農業女神伊西斯、正義女神馬特、死亡女神奈芙提斯和女戰神賽克麥特。[#Legal]
Includes Bastet, Hathor, Isis, Ma'at, Nephthys and Sekhmet Heads plus Goddess Top and Bottom for a total of 8 pieces! [#Legal]
